reliquary:AreaDenial.NAME: Terretoriale Verweisung
reliquary:AreaDenial.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This power augments the behavior of the base game's Thorns power.

reliquary:BattleHymnPlus.NAME: Kriegslied
reliquary:BattleHymnPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Battle Hymn power.

reliquary:BlurPlus.NAME: Fata Morgana
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBlock verdoppelt sich, anstatt entfernt zu werden.
#yBlock verdoppelt sich, anstatt entfernt zu werden, für die nächsten #b
reliquary:BlurPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Blur power.

reliquary:ChainReaction.NAME: Kettenreaktion
reliquary:ChainReaction.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: Combust is an existing power in the base game.

reliquary:DeathWarrant.NAME: Death Warrant
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yAttack against this enemy this turn deals an additional #b

reliquary:FocusDown.NAME: Focus Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, lose #b

reliquary:HandSize.NAME: Hand Size Up
DESCRIPTIONS: Your maximum hand size is increased by #b
Your maximum hand size is decreased by #b

reliquary:HelloPlus.NAME: Fizzbuzz
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b
random Uncommon card into your hand.
random Uncommon cards into your hand.
reliquary:HelloPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Hello power.

NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an alternate version of the Watcher's Blasphemy debuff.
Instead of killing you at the end of the current turn (1 turn), it kills you in N turns.
It takes the name ('Blasphemer,' in English) from the existing debuff, so you don't need to translate that.

DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss to #b1 this turn.
Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss to #b1 for the next #b
reliquary:IntangibleTurns.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This a turn-based version of the base game's Intangible power..

reliquary:InvincibleTurns.NAME: Invincible
DESCRIPTIONS: Can't be harmed for the next #b

reliquary:LesserDuplication.NAME: Lesser Duplication
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next cost 0 or 1 card is played twice this turn.
cost 0 or 1 cards are played twice this turn.
reliquary:LesserDuplication.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an weaker version of the base game's Duplication power.

reliquary:MrofOhce.NAME: Mrof Ohce
DESCRIPTIONS: The last card you play each turn is played twice.
cards you play each turn are played twice.
reliquary:MrofOhce.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an alternate version of the base game's Echo Form power. 'Mrof Ohce' is Echo Form backwards.

reliquary:QuantumAI.NAME: Quantum AI
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b1 of #b2 random #yPower cards into your hand.
At the start of your turn, add #b1 of #b2 random #yPower cards into your hand twice.
At the start of your turn, add #b1 of #b2 random #yPower cards into your hand #b
reliquary:QuantumAI.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Study power.

reliquary:Rattled.NAME: Rattled
DESCRIPTIONS: Receives double damage from the next unblocked attack.
Receives double damage from the next #b
reliquary:Rattled.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: A pun on rattlesnakes and being 'rattled,' i.e. unnerved or disarmed.

reliquary:ReboundPlus.NAME: Resound
DESCRIPTIONS: The next card you play this turn is placed into your hand.
cards you play this turn are placed into your hand.
reliquary:ReboundPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Rebound power.

reliquary:ReduceColorlessCost.NAME: Pallor
DESCRIPTIONS: The next Colorless card you play costs #b1 less.
Colorless cards you play cost #b1 less.

reliquary:StormPlus.NAME: Superstorm
reliquary:StormPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Storm power.

reliquary:StudyPlus.NAME: Cram
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, shuffle #b
reliquary:StudyPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Study power.

reliquary:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
DESCRIPTIONS: Other enemies can't be attacked until this enemy dies.

reliquary:ThermalPaste.NAME: Thermal Paste
reliquary:ThermalPaste.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This power augments the behavior of the Defect's Heatsinks power.

reliquary:Vim.NAME: Envimmed
NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: 'Envimmed' isn't a real word, it's an adjective I made up to mean 'infused with vim,' as 'invigorated' means 'infused with vigor.'
Feel free to use anything that means invigorated, or make one up...?
This uses the description strings from the Berserk power.
